reviewText: I don't normally place dice -but this taught me a lot to look out for.
To basic for an experienced player - not helpful

The title says it all.  It is OK, but there are better products, like Weapons of the Card Shark by Jeff Wessmiller.

The problem with all of these DVDs is that they are essentially teaching how to perform the false shuffles and cuts, but don't address the best ways to detect the moves.
